queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS`person` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`lastname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='utf8_spanish_ci';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS`producto` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`nombre` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`descr` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`precio` INT NULL DEFAULT '0',`stock` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='utf8_spanish_ci';
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS`usuario` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`nombre` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`password` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='utf8_spanish_ci';
